name: C.I. Shenanigans
description:
Located in the heart of Spokane on the beautiful Centennial Trail overlooking the Spokane River, C.I. Shenanigans in Spokane is a short walk or drive from anywhere downtown. Parking is ample and access through the new convention center parking lot is convenient.

Quick lunch service ensures that a one-hour lunch break leaves plenty of time to return to the office. Many of Shenanigan's guests drive from neighboring Coeur D’Alene, in the great state of Idaho, just to enjoy the picturesque setting.

The lounge at C.I. Shenanigans in Spokane offers one of the most unique casual dining experiences, whether your taste includes the vast dining menu or just a sampling of appetizers. Sporting events shown on six large screen TV's are a favorite of the many out of town hotel guests that continue to return to Shenanigan's during their frequent visits to the Spokane Valley. You will always recognize a familiar face, as the team at Shenanigan's is more of a family than a staff and have been together for years. Shenanigans is fun, casual with upscale appeal.

name: McCashin's Brewery
description: Welcome to McCashin’s Brewery, home of New Zealand’s finest beverages. Our distinctive range of beverages is lovingly handcrafted from traditional recipes that have been the pride of the McCashin family for almost 30 years. We use only the finest natural ingredients, sourced mainly from the Nelson region of New Zealand, a region renowned for its organically rich soils and perfect climate. Our Palaeo water is amongst the purest in the world. And it is this water – along with our fresh, 100% pure ingredients – that give our beer, cider and spirits that uniquely refreshing flavour, which McCashin’s is famous for. Please take a tour of our website, and if you have any questions please contact us. We’d be delighted to hear from you.

name: Obolon Joint Stock Company
description:
The corporation’s history dates back to 1974 when the construction site of the future brewery was sand filled. The start-up of production was dedicated to the 1980 Olympic Games.

Czech experts were engaged in the project as world-renowned brewmasters. They were the ones who identified the construction site for the new brewery. The choice of construction site was determined by the main factor, namely the availability of huge reserves of soft, crystal-clear water. Today, the water from Jurassic bedrock (290 m) ensures the high quality of our products.

Soon afterwards, the enterprise gave the impetus to developing the largest corporation in Ukraine to produce beer, low alcohol and soft drinks, and mineral water.

The plant received its current name only in 1986, after the district of Kyiv with the same name. The word ‘Obolon’ comes from the times of Kievan Rus, when it denoted low riverside meadows.

Built according to a Czech design, the brewery produced beer that gained wide popularity. After Ukraine became independent, Obolon was the first corporation to export hopped beverages to Europe and the USA. Obolon trademark beer started being perceived as traditional Ukrainian beer in the whole world.

After a quarter of a century, Obolon has evolved into a world-renowned trademark. Today people on five continents associate Obolon with Ukrainian beer #1.

name: Sierra Nevada Brewing Company
description:
The Sierra Nevada Brewing Company was established in 1980 by homebrewers Ken Grossman and Paul Camusi. Camusi retired in 1998 and sold his share in the company to Grossman.

Located in Chico, California, Sierra Nevada Brewing is one of the most popular craft breweries currently operating in the United States. Its Pale Ale is world renowned, and the brewery produces almost 700,000 barrels of beer per year. Sierra Nevada's Pale Ale is the second best-selling craft beer in the United States, behind the Boston Beer Company's Samuel Adams Boston Lager.

Sierra Nevada's specialty brews include the winter seasonal Celebration, which is similar to the pale ale, but hoppier; and Summerfest, a lager which is citrusy and sunny.

name: The Distillery Restaurant
description:
The Distillery is an award winning high energy bar and restaurant that offers fantastic ambiance and service for any drinking and dining occasion whether it's business, pleasure or a celebration.
 
We created a restaurant that offers a large selection of draft beers, a diverse menu of American fare, non-stop sports viewing entertainment and play a heady selection of classic rock music on a state-of-the-art audio system to ensure that all the bases are covered. On December 11th, 1980 the original Distillery Restaurant opened on Mt Hope Avenue in Rochester, New York. It quickly became a spot for locals who met over good food and cold beer to discuss the various issues of the day, catch up with friends, make new acquaintances and celebrate life.
